name: Robot Wrangler
description:
Description
Robot Wrangler is a small mini-game about a robot farmer needing to control their livestock by draining each robot's power. Accumulate as much power from your robots as possible!

How to play
WASD to move, and aim using the mouse. Click the robot's outlet to drain power from it. You can only do this within a certain range, so make sure you are close enough. The game ends when you lose 5 of your robots, so try to move fast!

palette used: SLSO8

sound effects generated with sfxr
